PAGE.TITLE: Automated window creation for shell commands
PAGE.CONTENT:
Execute a command (here ps --forest -edf).
If this script is not called from a tty, it will automatically create one.
#!/bin/csh
tty -s
if ( $status ) then
setenv X_WAIT
xterm -geom 132x40 -sb -sl 5000 -e $0 $*
else
ps --forest -edf
if ( $?X_WAIT ) then
echo "Press <Enter> to exit"
echo "$<" >& /dev/null
endif
endif
